text: And those who disbelieved are driven to Hell (in) groups/gangs until when they came to it, (then) its doors/entrances were opened, and its safe keepers said to them: "Did not messengers from you come to you, they read/recite on (to) you your Lord`s evidences/verses , and they warn/give you notice (of) this your day/time, this meeting (today`s meeting)?" They said: "Yes/certainly." And but the torture`s words/expression became deserved/a fact on the disbelievers
